summary: A young journalist turns to an assassin for help when a team of hired killers comes gunning for her.
cast: Yûsuke Kawazu|Shima Iwashita|Kayoko Honoo|Fumio Watanabe|Kazuya Kosaka|Kôji Mitsui|Keijirô Morozumi|Ryôhei Uchida|Hiroshi Mizushima|Masaaki Hirao|Ichirô Sugai|Yûko Kashiwagi|Shigeru Kôyama|Kô Nishimura|Norikazu Takeda|Fumiko Hirayama|Osamu Abe|Masahiko Shimazu|Masahiko Inoue|Tomoka Hasebe|Masanao Kawakane|Kazuo Kobayashi|Shôsuke Oni|Tsutomu Niijima|Junko Hara
title: Yûhi ni akai ore no kao
